message.content:
## Dairy-Free, Garlic-Free, Honey-Free, Almonds/Pistachio/Cashew-Free Meal Plan

This meal plan provides balanced nutrition and avoids your specified allergens. 

**Monday:**
*   Breakfast:  Oatmeal with berries and sunflower seeds
*   Lunch: Quinoa salad with chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, bell peppers, and a lemon vinaigrette
*   Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, sweet potatoes)

**Tuesday:**
*   Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with spinach and mushrooms
*   Lunch: Leftover quinoa salad
*   Dinner: Lentil soup with a side of whole-grain bread

**Wednesday:**
*   Breakfast: Smoothie with banana, mango, spinach, and coconut milk
*   Lunch: Salad with grilled chicken or tempeh, avocado, lettuce, and a balsamic vinaigrette 
*   Dinner: Chickpea curry (use coconut milk as a base) served with brown rice

**Thursday:**
*   Breakfast: Chia seed pudding with berries and hemp seeds
*   Lunch: Leftover chickpea curry
*   Dinner: Baked chicken breast with roasted Brussels sprouts and sweet potatoes

**Friday:**
*   Breakfast: Toast with mashed avocado and a sprinkle of Everything Bagel seasoning 
*   Lunch:  Black bean burgers on whole-wheat buns with lettuce, tomato, and your favorite dairy-free condiments.
*   Dinner: Pizza with a cauliflower crust, marinara sauce, vegetables, and dairy-free cheese (if desired)

**Saturday:**
*   Breakfast: Pancakes made with almond-free flour blend, topped with berries and maple syrup
*   Lunch:  Leftover pizza
*   Dinner: Stir-fry with tofu or tempeh, vegetables (broccoli, carrots, snap peas), and a soy sauce-based sauce.

**Sunday:**
*   Breakfast: Waffles made with almond-free flour blend, topped with fruit and dairy-free syrup
*   Lunch: Salad with hard-boiled eggs, avocado, and your favorite vinaigrette
*   Dinner: Roasted vegetable lasagna (use dairy-free cheese if desired)


**Notes:**

*  Adjust portion sizes to your individual needs. 
*  Feel free to substitute ingredients based on your preferences and availability. 
*   Be sure to check labels carefully to avoid any accidental allergens.
